word:
THIS LETTER TO NELLIE LOOKS AT SOME OF THE 
     SAME QUESTIONS AS THE EARLIER ONE TO ROLF. 
     THE CROWD SHE IS ASSOCIATING WITH IS NOT 
     GOOD. HER SPECIAL FRIEND IS IRREVERENT, 
     LAZY, AND USES FOUL LANGUAGE AS WELL. OTHER 
     HABITS ARE QUESTIONABLE ALSO. ELLEN WHITE 
     ASKS SOME VERY STRAIGHTFORWARD QUESTIONS 
     THAT MIGHT WELL APPLY TO YOU AS YOU READ 
     THIS LETTER. 
                                                                           25
